formula.text: = Cash available at year end / Operating Expenditure per month

formula_v2.text: = Cash available at year end / Operating Expenditure per month

formula.text: = (Unauthorised, Irregular, Fruitless and Wasteful Expenditure / Actual Operating Expenditure) * 100

formula_v2.text: = (Unauthorised, Irregular, Fruitless and Wasteful Expenditure / Actual Operating Expenditure) * 100

ref.title: Over and under spending reports to parliament

formula.text: = ((Actual Capital Expenditure - Budgeted Capital Expenditure) / Budgeted Capital Expenditure) * 100

formula_v2.text: = ((Actual Capital Expenditure - Budgeted Capital Expenditure) / Budgeted Capital Expenditure) * 100

actual.item_description: capital type code NEW, RENEWAL, UPGRADING
capital type code NEW, RENEWAL, UPGRADING
capital type code NEW, RENEWAL, UPGRADING

ref.title: Over and under spending reports to parliament

formula.text: = ((Actual Operating Expenditure - Budget Operating Expenditure) / Budgeted Operating Expenditure) * 100

formula_v2.text: = ((Actual Operating Expenditure - Budget Operating Expenditure) / Budgeted Operating Expenditure) * 100

formula.text: = (Repairs and maintenance expenditure / (Property, Plant and Equipment + Investment Property)) * 100

formula_v2.text: = (Repairs and maintenance expenditure / (Property, Plant and Equipment + Investment Property)) * 100
